import React from "react"; class Summary extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.handleAmountInput = this.handleAmountInput.bind(this) } handleAmountInput(e) { } render() { const { total, tax, discount } = this.props const balance = total - tax - discount return (

SUMMARY
  • {total}
  • {tax}
  • {discount}
  • {balance}
  • 0
) } } export default Summary
